/usr/bin/c++  -W -Wall -pedantic -Wno-non-virtual-dtor -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-variadic-macros -Wshadow -pipe -std=c++11  -g -g    CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/exampleB1.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1ActionInitialization.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1DetectorConstruction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1EventAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1PrimaryGeneratorAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1RunAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB1.dir/src/B1SteppingAction.cc.o  -o exampleB1  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/G4-install/lib64: /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4Tree.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4FR.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4GMocren.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4visHepRep.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4RayTracer.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4VRML.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4vis_management.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4modeling.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4interfaces.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4persistency.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4error_propagation.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4readout.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4physicslists.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4tasking.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4parmodels.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4run.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4event.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4tracking.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4processes.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4analysis.so /usr/lib64/libexpat.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4digits_hits.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4track.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4particles.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4geometry.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4materials.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4zlib.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4graphics_reps.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4intercoms.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4global.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4clhep.so /opt/G4-install/lib64/libG4ptl.so.0.0.2 -pthread
